def ispalindrome(s):
	s = str(s)
	return s==s[::-1]

max = 10000000
primes = []
isprime = [1]*10000000
isprime[0]=isprime[1]=0
for i in xrange(2, max):
    if isprime[i]:
        primes.append(i)
        for j in xrange(i+i,max, i):
            isprime[j]=0

s =  int(raw_input())
if s<4751053:
	# palpos = 0
	# for _ in xrange(0, 4751053):
	# 	if primes[_] > s:
	# 		break
	# 	if ispalindrome(primes[_]):
	# 		palpos= _
	# print primes[palpos]
	while not (isprime[s] and ispalindrome(s)):	s+=1
	print s
else:
	palpos = -1
	for _ in xrange(len(primes)-1, 0, -1):
		print primes[_] , s
		if primes[_] < s:
			break
		if ispalindrome(primes[_]):
			palpos = _

	print primes[palpos]
